summary.event: 5th LATAM School in Software Engineering Research
summary.co_location: XVI Brazilian Conference on Software: Practice and Theory (CBSoft 2025)
target_audience: Researchers who defended their PhD theses in 2024
goals: Help new and future Software Engineering researchers become part of the software engineering community
Explore potential pathways in SE research
Understand challenges and opportunities in SE research

mentoring.structure: Students will present posters and have mentoring sessions lasting approximately 30 minutes
mentoring.interaction: Students will receive feedback from renowned researchers

eligibility: PhD and MSc students from Latin American institutions
Undergraduate students working on software engineering topics
application_requirements: List of publications (if any) from 2022 to 2025

keynotes: Collaboration opportunities between industry and academia
Balancing life and health in academia
program.mentoring_program: Involves groupings by topics and personalized feedback
program.panel: Panel of 3-4 researchers answering student questions
